its indepentant from a meal however.

i'm sitting back and letting it take me slowly
it's the only thing to make me feel good even though i feel bad

Her words penetrate the four corners My body, My mind, My heart and soul Over the trenches with ease she moves Carefully constructed defences Overwhelmed with a smile Castle walls within my subconcious Impenatrable to invaders Of all races ages types and castes Tall as a mountain, sturdy as stone They crumble with a kiss My body a piece of hardest steel Conditioned to endure harsh treatment Beaten and heated into a shape Able to resist every extreme Turns jelly with a touch My heart the dryest barren desert Both heat and wind continue the drought Miles around, nothing to be seen An ugly place devoid of all life Is flooded with a word My soul tucked away in its hiding Not seeing the light of day for years In this reality, its not found Stuck in a place completely absent Uncovered with a glance Clever plans and protective actions Steps taken to ensure my safety Strategies put into place to absolve All one could do to defend himself Obsolete with a love

yesterday.. my troubles seemed so far away..
now im afraid their here to stay, i believe in yesterday.

im tired - sick even.. i think im going back to bed

i dont know what the fuck to do boutitboutit
i dont understand her

i missed work, i couldn't get myself out of bed..
i didnt really want to wake up and carry on a day.
it just didnt seem like the thing to do.
dawn woke me up at about 12:30, bitching about 
how we never hang out anymore - sorry kiddo lifes a bitch like that.
ya, i'm still confused i dont know what to do from here, if anything
i want to fade away from people for a while.
i speak to you in riddles

While my mind gently weeps
I look at world, and notice its turning
Still my mind gently weeps
I notice the need is still burning
I don't know how someone could control you
I've seen many and i think i've told you
While my mind gently weeps
I look at myself and see im doing nothing but growing older
Still my mind gently weeps
as the days pass, i fear i've grown colder
I dont see how or if i could live without you
im about you

"Man is an animal and that in the bitter struggle for existence all animals are shameless egoists by sheer necessity. At bottom, they are all SOLITARY and SELFISH. To the extent that humans act sociably and on occasion even unselfishly - i.e. mating, rearing children, living and work with each others - they have learned to do so in order to satisfy some self-centred motive such as lust or hunger."



 (Thomas, Hobbes 1679) 






 I am one of great wisdom,
And ruler of this kingdom.
Upon this throne I sit and gaze,
Into the dark and murky haze.

My eyes glow a vermilion red,
As I burn into the souls of the dead.
To pass the judgement on their fate;
Shall they go to Heaven, or Hell's gate?

Surrounded by darkness and by gloom,
This is my fate, and my doom. 
Bound to this infinite misery was I,
By the Gods who dwelled beyond the sky.

I once was human and full of faith,
But now I am but an ominous wraith.
The sins and selfishness of society,
Has left me torned and cold; devoid of sincerity.

With bitterness I now scrutinize,
Into the deads' past lives.
Have they sinned and lied,
Or abused others before they died?

Did they used others for a purpose,
Were they infidels and promiscuous?
Or were they loyal and benevolent,
Chivalrous and perhaps God sent.

Only ones whom are humble and truthful,
Shall enter Heaven with their souls.
All others shall be at eternal mercy,
To Hell's flames; this, I do decree....





Depression
Is my inspiration,
For joy has no meaning to me.

Gloom
Is my theme,
For gayeity has no depth.

Sadness
Is my form,
For happiness has no structure.

Death
Is my ending verse,
Because no-one lives forever.

<center>
On his way to dinner when it took him by suprise
And with one pull of the trigger he would vanish overnight
Dancing by the roadside, holding on for dear life
The a gun from out of nowhere made a widow of his wife

Time after time
I guess that love is blind
I couldn't read your mind
Line after line

Line after line
It was written in your eyes
I guess it's no surprise
Time after time

I can hear them whispering
Shadows in the rain
Thinking how it might have been
Time after time

Line after line you broke me
Day after day
I watched love fade away
I wanted love to stay
Day after day

The games we played
The foolish things we say
The pain won't go away
Day after day

Candlelight is shimmering
Shadows on the wall
Thinking how it might have been
Day after day
The games we play you broke me

Candlelights are shimmering
Shadows on the wall
Thinking how it might have been
Time after time
Line after line you broke me
</center>

alone in the dark.. i'm running from my future and hiding forgetting my past... party friday night - alas?.. im bored with interaction and only affection appeals.. crying in the silence.. alone in the distance.. away from this place we shall go, in death or life may  we go indestructable to worrys of this world.. my place is no more than yours and your no better than mine.. self destruction is upon my lips and pain has filled the air.. i see only complexion.. the light once carryed, now a dark effection.. the hope once brought finally broke at last.. this line is private - noone gets the number. to open yourself up to the world will do you no good. corperate domination - individual manipulation.... crushing the congregation.... free from my nation.. i'll see the day of my death.. i'll feel the last of my breath.. i wish only to be free.. i wish only to be happy... i wish only for the best... 
i wish........

So go away, leave me alone...

i've ben thinking about sara a little bit lately..  i kinda wonder what my life would be like if she was still a part of it.. probley worse.. maybe better.. i wouldn't know... i was coding yesterday and this song game on by random - shania twain? from this moment... she made me download that song.. she said it was 'our song'... *sigh*... its horrable because she would sing it to me and she said she would never stop loving me.. she doesnt even talk to me now.. love is fickle.. false... words.. they can mean nothing.. i tell kate shes pretty.. and she shrugs it off.. well kates smart.. or experianced... im gullable.. why do i trust everyone... i take their words for gold.. inturn.. i dont express my feelings.. for this way.. i won't establish a false bond with anyone.. and they can't hurt me..

The days pass upon civilization. with the rising and setting of the sun our lives fade away into the future. never once do we all hold a moment in all its tranquility. yet- this world is dark.. cold.. and unloving. If it had its way we would all lay to waste.. its the hope that stops this from happening.. hope of a better tomorrow, hope of a better life, hope of true happyness in and of itself.. however in my own eyes, i have lost this hope.. this world is going to swollow me up as it pleases.. i am not here to scream and cry for salvation.. i accept this inevitable death with open arms.. for without hope - there is nothing
